text.p: Paris St Germain (France) beat AEK Athens (Greece) 3-0 (halftime 2-0) in their European Cup Winners' Cup quarter-final second leg match on Thursday:

AEK: 1-Ilias Atmatsidis, 25-Vassilis Borbokis, 21-Michalis Kasapis, 12-Stelios Manolas, 6-Michalis Vlachos (13-Vaios Karagiannis 56), 2-Triantafilos Maheridis, 7-Timour Ketspagia, 8-Toni Savevski, 9-Daniel Batista (23-Christos Maladenis 59), 10-Christos Costis, 11-Demis Nikolaidis.

PSG: 1-Bernard Lama, 13-Laurent Fournier (17-Jimmy Algerino 85), 4-Bruno N'Gotty, 6-Paul le Guen, 2-Daniel Kenedy, 8-Vincent Guerin, 15-Benoit Cauet, 10-Rai, 7-Leonardo (26-Cyrille Pouget 82), 11-Patrice Loko, 19-Jerome Leroy.
